121132121121111.content:
You arrive with Nova, the amazon like mouse, at her house. A gigantic building made of bricks towering in front of you and some big empty space to the left and right let you know, that she couldnt be the only one living here. But still there is only one wooden door, made for her mouse size to enter. She let you down so you are finally released from her grip and her big warm boobs.
"There we are" she says cheerfully and slowly steps towards the door, you follow her but still find no word as you look up the titanic building in front of you. You can hear some noises coming from behind the door, it actually sounds like music and chattering, like a very crowded public bar or something.
"And this is where you life?" you wonder. Nova nods and says "Yeah. Its the greatest place on earth for me." she says with a smile and steps towards the door as you keep following her. She opens the door which isnt even locked and as you make your first three steps behind Nova into the room, you immediatly notice that some other mouse girls are sitting right next to the door. Nova stands still and you step right next to her as you finally take your first glance of the dome like room.

It's a gigantic hall, filled with mouse girls all over the place. There are several terrace here and there and they all do different kind of stuff. On the first, overhelming view you can see a few mouse playing chest, a big band playing some country music, two girls are wrestling while a ring of others cheering towards them and some others doing some drinking game. Some of them, way higher in about 30m on one of those terrace are also working; Painting, making tattoos, calculating... Its like a city of its own and all you can see are female mouse in different shades and colours. It dosnt take too long as the first mice at the entry notice your presents and one by one they stop doing on whatever they do and start to stare at you. Nova still seems pretty confident but you getting nervous. Soon, the whole city of mices turned quiet as they all looking down to the newcomer, you.

Nova smiles as she lifts her harms to speak and yells; "Sisters! Let us welcome Josh, a human that will life among us!" she exclaims as her voice echoes through the air. She takes a few steps aside to present you. You start to sweat, the enourmes crowd looks at you and suddenly; A gigantic wave of cheering and yelling, they actually seem to celebrate your presents and you start to smile. You look at Nova and she smiles back; "Welcome." she simply says with a grin as she puts one hand onto your back to guide you through the city in a city. As you start your journey with Nova through the city, you pass by some takeaways aswell. Some other mice patting your sholder and welcome you, giving you one of theyr borito like food for free. You are very overhelmed by theyr kindness so you cant stop to smile.

You walk deeply into the heart of the city, always following nova as the mice gazing at you. After a few minutes of walk, you reach a big hexagon tent, pure white fabric hanging from different corners of this part of a hall towards the center of it, creating a interesting roof. As you enter this seperated room, you find yourself in a throne room and on that throne sits a way bigger mouse queen. Some other mouse whispering is something into her big ears as you enter with Nova the room as she looks down on you. She wears a jumpsuit which is also pure white. Nova starts speaking "Queen Melina, this is..." before Nova was able to finish her sentence the Queen interrupts her. "I allready know who that is Nova, Josh... from another world and a human." she says. "Y-yes..." is all that Nova is able to reply. "And you are here to ask if Josh can stay with us." the Queen also adds and nova only replys with a nod. You are speechless the whole time, she seems to be informed about every detail that happens in her kingdom... So this isnt even just a city, its a whole new state with own political rules and behaviors. You are fascinated but also afraid of this thought. Melina stands up, she walks down the several stairs to the two, the whole time she is starring at you. You stay moveless like a statue as she approachs you, her sand coloured fur shines and she seems even bigger now that you'r up close. She must be about 6 meters for your so she easily outstands all the other mice.

The queen of mice is looking deeply into your eyes as she reaches with one hand for your chin, getting her beautiful face closer to you. Her light blue eyes penetrating into your mind as she asks "So Josh, from the other world, do you want to stay here, in my kingdom?" she asks with a small grin. You are not sure what to say first, is she good or evil? Her overall appereance let you think that she is kind but her movement and way to speak gives you a shiver. You say the only thing that you can actually say in such a situation. "Yes..." you stummer. She smiles and let your face go "So be it!" she shouts and walks back to her throne "Welcome, Josh from the other world, welcome!" says the Queen and a gigantic crowd that secretly waited outside the tent like room was cheering once again. Your feel better and Melina was sitting down on the throne again but a slight move of her finger made the crowd silent again and nervously you wonder why. "One more thing... Josh." she says and you wonder what it will be this time...

1211321211211112.content:
Queen Melina sits down, looking down to you with a smirk. She crosses her legs and says "Since your wish is to stay in our society, i demand you to show yourself usefull. I dont require a servant which sits arround all day." Her words makes sense to you, you want to show yourself usefull anyway, you have never been the type of guy that was sitting arround all day. "Yes... my Queen." you say kinda happy. "This means..." she starts saying and with one flick of her finger a young and well dressed mouse puts a new sheet of paper into a typewriter. "...from this day on, the human known as Josh, decided to join my kingdom and serve me as his rightfull queen. He serves the mice of this kingdom whenever any mice desires it and in anyway. For that he earns the title 'Servant of the Kingdom'. The honour to own this title recommends a never ending shift to serve our kind. If the Servant of the Kingdom isnt able to fufill his given task, the Queens Guardians are allowed to take any action to bring him back onto his righteous way." she smiles and the typewriter stops. You are stunned, does that mean you are like... a slave too all these mice?! Did she actually made a law about you serving hundreds or even thousands of mice at once?! This is madness! But before you can find any words, the Queen just nods and says. "Thats it 'Servant of the Kingdom' you can go now. Im sure Nova would be pleased to show you arround the city." nova immediatly replys to her "Yes my queen." and so she took you by your sholder and leads you towards the exit. You are still shocked and not sure what to think of all this. You look up to Nova and you have to ask "Did... did she actually turned me into a slave?!" Nova isnt sure what to awnser first but she leads you through the city again. Alot of eyes gazing upon you and many whispering towards each other and you are sure that they just talk about you.
"Not a slave... You are... a servant. All you have to do is to work on your given tasks and your first task is to explore the city with me. It all sounds harder then it looks like." says Nova but you can see that even she is kinda nervous. "However, its a honour that the queen gave you a title just by looking at you." says the Mouse with a smirk. "Aha...." is all you can awnser, you wish you wont have a title but freedom instead. You try to calm down, maybe she is right, maybe it wont will be as hard as you think. You two walked for a while and Nova showed you some smaller not so interesting buildings but then you reach with her your first destination.

"This is our Arena. Most of the sports like wrestling, karate, fencing but also volleyball, basketball and graplingball are held here. Today the wrestling team is exercising but they take theyr sport very serious so even some practice can be really rough. Do you want to check it out or shell we keep going?" she asks.

Then she moved her paw away from you and grabbed you, heading directly to the kitchen.
"Stop, why are you doing this? I'm here for your help! Don't do that! Stop!"
She opened the pot you saw the last time, and spread her hand above it, about to release you while you were pleading her to listen and stop. Then, a word came out of your mouth, a word which changed everything :
"I just wanted to be sent back to my world with the wizard's book! Damn it!"

She instantely stopped, not moving a muscle. Her gaze filled with lust and cruelty suddenly vanished with a more sensible expression.

"I never asked for this... All I want is to go back home... Do everything you want to me, but just let me go no matter the price..."
"The price..." she said whispering. She was looking like if she was sad, did she took any mercy? You decided to carry on that way.

"I know about the story... his coming and sudden vanishment. I understand all that fame and all, but I'm not that man. I just got called somehow without my consent... and the one who casted me certainly just missed me according to what I've heard... I've also heard it was possible to send me back to my place via a book someone found in the ruins under the university... seeing your power, I'm sure you are the new owner of the wizard book... and you can help me. I'm ready to accept bringing you fun since it seems to be what people here are looking for but no harm... I don't want to end cooked or something..." You said shivering, trying to look confident and sincere.
"-No..." She said "Not me. I do it in the name of rightousness... You don't understand..."
"-Would you mind explain me? I really want to know what's going on and why are you searching for me so much... Are you some man eater or something?"
"-Tsss... You don't get it... But I guess all we need for now, is a good coffee..."

So she placed you on the coffee table of her living room and prepared some coffee and brought some biscuits to the table, squeezing some nearby your position so you could feed yourself with crumbs. But the thing which impressed you the most was when she did opened a box at the top of her shelves to take a tiny cup from it with somekind of long pyramidal tube with an hole at the tip to pour coffee inside without any wasting. She put then the coffee right in front of you and impressed you a lot when you touched it : it wasn't a small replica made of plastic for some dolls house but actually, a real cup made of porcel... a cup from your world!

You gave it a stare with a complete fascination.

"Is something wrong?" she asked.
"-How... how did you got these cups? These are from my world don't they?"
"-Yes... And I have more stuff like this one in the box. Those are actually pretty old, a family legacy."
"A legacy you said?" This was going to be more interesting to you. "Are you saying you were not giant long times before?"
"Haha!" She giggled "No... We have always been giant people but well... Listen, I guess you should know about the story of my family to understand all that thing. Please enjoy the sweet things and coffee..

I guess you've heard about the official story. Some wizard coming from another world came here, powerful, unkillable and tamed all clans leaders to make one united nation filled with knowledge imported from his world, technologies and social codes... and who suddenly vanished for countless different reasons. Let me say you the truth about it :

if the beginning of the plot was right, all the rest was just lies. The wizard was happy in here and even found someone to love who loved him back. And this person is part of my ancesters, she even got pregnant from him so I have human blood in veins like everyone in the family. Unfortunately, he had to live because of two problems.. first, he discovered that immortaly is slowly disappearing when you live in a foreign world for too long as your air and food from that world are getting parts of your body days after days. Since the former clan leaders'children used to seek vengeance to vainly get their power back, it was not rare for him to face giants in his life but if it was the only issue, he would have just rely on his power instead of immortality, no... He actually left when he learnt his loyal friend betrayed by asking question about your world and revealing to the world the wizard was the only human with such a power while all the rest was way more vulnerable... This gave some the idea to find a way to leave our world and invade your human realm... since you can't die in a world you don't belong after a long time, just imagine a giant like me on Earth? I would be a living god having full control over mankind... And the scary part of it is when those who just wanted their power back saw the wizard nowhere, they choose to just take power and become mayors... but for those who wanted to invade your world, these crazy ones just refused to give up and always tried to get their paws on the book the wizard left us to keep contact and exchange objects as he just could not live without us since we're a family...

So we had to set the family mansion to fire and spread the rumor the book burnt inside. This worked pretty well as some are still exploring their ruins which are now the foundation of the university. But we actually just kept the book with us, hidden among our lugages.
Unfortunately, the most stubborn ones just don't want to give up and started to explore science deeply with the hope to find out a way to create portals with technology and fulfill their thirst of domination..."

"-So what about me? And the book? Where is it? Why trying to change me into sock or panty instead of just sending me back?"

"-This is the saddest part of the story nowaday... The book actually have two parts, one for messages so everything you write on the page is written on the page of the other book to exchange messages, and the other is for requests which describe an object or even a person to move from a realm to another, how, when and where, and those requests proceed if the book from the other side answer 'yes' or 'no'. For years, the wizard was talking to us and sending presents but this time suddenly stopped. Maybe the wizard eventualy just died or something... but thirty years later, new requests suddenly appeared, always without any message and no answer to our question.

To us, the thing was simple : someone else took the book. So we set some rules in the family and decided to make sure nothing more from your world should be accepted here and should be removed, hidden or sent back at all cost, even more living things such like you as we decided to reject all requests and chase item in case of mistakes.."

"-Terrific indeed.. So that's why you change people like me into object, a way 'to destroy' me? I see... But are you really sure you could just not send a request?"
12113212121222112111122122.title: A Stormy Discussion

choices: Don't do it and just take some more rest on the table.
121132121212221121111221221.content:
She looked a bit disturbed by your question, like if she was trying to avoid a point...

"Please Shila" you said "Tell me... I need to know!"

"-Well, I was about to reveal it, but we actually never had a rule about changing people into slime so they vanish away after several days... This is a rule I had to set myself because... I failed on my mission to protect the book..."

"-What do you mean?" You ask nervously.

"-Someone broke into my flat five years ago and stole the book. I don't know who this person is but the only evidence is..."

She stood up and came to an armiore, taking something inside and immediately shows it to you

"This."

You could see it from your distance it was some gray hairs, pretty short compared to the shepherd's fur.

"Don't you have more elements?"

She stored it back inside the armiore and sat on the couch facing the table you're standing on.

"Well, all I know is that fucker entered by the window, took everything which looked valuable and left. The wizard book have gold on its edge, it was a good choice... The question is : do the thief kept the book for personnal uses or sell it to someone?
For sure, if you are here like several other back in time, it means the one in your world has decided to send you here and someone from our realm has decided to accept it. Who, how and why? This is the puzzle to solve...
For the specy, well, I would think about some grey squirrel but how to be sure who is this person? We can't even know the gender nor potential location this rogue could be living in...
Unless..."

"Unless...?"

"-Unless we go in some night clubs or bars and try to spot someone who would fit the description. There can't be thousand of grey vermits in the quarter. With your size, you could easily infiltrate a pocket or a bag when I go nearby it..."

"-And what should I do if I find the book? I bet it won't fit my size to be carried..."

"-Well, just escape and come back to me so I could get it myself. I'm a great girl, I know how to defend myself and make my way. I just need to be sure we will not get in someone's place without any good reason... I may also count on you to find some information about this illegal owner so I could force this person to give the book to me in case they refuse. As for your safety, I will just ask you to drink a potion so I could know where you are. If the scientist are behind this, I don't want them to have a human specy to experiment with at the risk to go further in their research progress...

For the one behind the other book, I really hope they will cooperate so I could reward you with a ticket to your home-sweet-home safely and how about giving some of my magic to help your life there... like giving you something to beat up the idiot who got the book in your world... I've seen idiots from your world but among all of them, you seem to be smartest."

At the moment you were about to crack a smile she added

"Don't claim a victory we don't have yet! Keep in mind I have nothing to force the other guy to grant you the right to go back. So you could eventualy get stucked in our city for a very long time... Of course, I would protect you and give you a cosy life if I get back the book. For now, you'll be my prisonner!" *She put her paws on the table nearby you.*

"I guess I have deserved a little massage after all that chat. That was a pleasure... but now I have to rest to be ready for tonight... Investigation needs stamina..."

You felt a bit annoyed but such status as you were almost feeling this like she was kidding you.

"Are you freaking serious? You said you were not the kind of doing this? Is that the life you describe as cosy? And why am I not allowed to get some rest as well? I'm gonna take all the risk, you know!"

"Do what you want... But I can choose between hiding you in my purse or sneakers... Same goes for the water, food and rest place I'll give you during these long days of investigation... I guess you owe this to me."
Then while you were thinking about it for a few silent minutes, she added :
"In addition, I never said I could not enjoy your presence.. after all, you said you were ready to pay any price to stay alive..."

She gave you a wink and start wiggling her toes slowly above your head. You had nothing to physicaly force you but you felt a bit blackmailed... But as she said, you have the power to do it or not... All you'll have to do is to face the consequences in case you refuse...or accept...

Apparently you got stucked to it and you fell unconscious because of the hit.
The girl above didn't seem to notice what happened at all, and started leaving the night club, unknowingly carrying you with her.

When you wake up you find yourself...

1211321212122211212.content:
You are trying hard to lick everything, alas you didn't had the time to finish. You are about on the middle of her insole, and you are hearing the door opening. It's the end of the last day you had to finish the job, and she's back before you could ever complete the task.

You crumble on the soaked insole... crying. You had your chance, and now you sealed your futur. Doomed to become nobody, nothing. Certainly even more insignificant than dust.
The boot moves and you slip out of it into Aksana's hand. She sat down on her bed, and checked your duty.

"-It's a good job." Joy was almost there but the fire get quickly doused. "But you've been too slow... An unfinished job is a job that has never been done. Dear Josh, I'm sorry to say : you're a good-to-nothing and now, it's time for you to become my servant... my toy... my slave..." She looked at you with a sadist grin "Ho, don't be sad, we are going to have to lot of fun together, since your life will be now based on my happiness, you'll be obliged to love anything you're going to experiment with me. If you don't, you won't have the choice unless you want to become crazy... ha-ha...an entire life to spend under my feet and... since I believe the legend that says a foreign being never die in a dimensional plan he don't belong to, I guess we could say for all eternity... maybe in my old days I'm gonna give you to my relatives... daughters or niece... a living legacy..."
"-Aksana, please... don't do that... It was almost done..."
"-I don't care, it was the deal!"
"-Keep me for a week or a month at least... not that long, please!"
"-No time to bargain, it's too late. Now your opinion have no meaning, your consent is mine and you'll have to call me 'mistress' or even 'goddess'. Now we are at night and tomorrow we are going to have a great big day with a hot sun, I'm going to sleep...and during these six days, I can tell you that I missed my boots, and I missed you..."

She took a black pantyhouse that was place on the bed. "Do you remember these? Yes... it's the one I was wearing during the party you've met my foot... still unwashed since my machine is not repaired yet... and it smell got worse since it stayed three days in my dirty laundry box... You touched the silk from the outside, stucked in my boot? Tonight, as the whole day of sunday, you're going to be inside this time... still stucked in my boot... without any chances to leave my paw..."

The tail of the wolf girl was moving like crazy... you could even hear in her voice some king of moaning. She looks completely excited at the idea of doing this to you. She almost had an orgasm... Placing a hand over her panty, between her legs...

In your case, words were missing... What could someone say in such situation? What word could be appropriate when someone stronger than you is telling you that your freedom is gone once for all... that you will never obey to your own will but someone's... What could be even attempted? It was a deadend...

She grabs you, and as she told you, dropped your body into the still wet pantyhose, with this same awful smell you could not get use to... before showing a foot going slowly down to your position... pressing your body against the silk until resistance occurs... then, for a last time, light going off... Some leather smell joining the stench, and you're stucked. Trapped against a sweaty foot, in a silky net filled with musk, inside an old boot... what kind of fate could be worse? Being doomed to live in such place for an undetermined delay?

Breathing was nigh impossible with such smell but you were force to get use to it. Forced to accept the feeling of having sweat drips covering your flesh until you lost completely your own smell, replacing it by the foot's one...as you were part of it... feeling the toes movements, pressed by her weight.

You had at least no duty to fulfill, but you guessed that the simple fact you were suffering was amuzing her. And it didn't go better the next day... From the morning to the evening, nothing would ever change... You would feel all her steps against your face, diving into the flesh of her hot soft soaked pawpads... drinking against your will some sweat while you are trying in vain to cry in pain... And above all, the heat of the sun, invading the inside of the boot with some kind of nasty hot air... hurting hard your nostrils...

But was it all? Only 24hours of this? Or will something else happen? You were worried about it... Aksana got you forever, and she got friends with her... will something happen to give you another opportunity? You had to be ready for it... even if everything seems to be lost...
1211321212122211212.title: Your new home, your new life : Aksana's boots

12113212121222112122.content:
Eventually, light returned to your eyes, and the pantyhose were slowly pulled off of you. However, you were still stuck to her paw because of how sticky it was with all the sweat that had accumulated.

         “I hope you enjoyed that experience,” Aksana said, “But I know it doesn’t matter. You didn’t have a choice.” She peels you off her paw which kind of hurts, like pulling tape off your whole body. Before you can do anything, she grips you firmly in her fist. Only your head pokes out. "Let me go!" you yell. She only responded with a squeeze of her fist with pain surging through your body. "I really hope you keep fighting, because punishing you like that is pretty fun, hehe," she taunts, pressing her thumb over your head, pushing you completely into her fist. A few seconds of struggling later, she lets you breathe again.

         "You kept me in your boots for so long," you whine.
         "What? It was only a whole day. It's not like you're not going to get used to it, being my slave and all. I fully intend to keep you in there even longer." You couldn't believe you had been in there for only a day. It felt like a week. You heard an "ahem" from behind you. Obviously someone else was in the room with you. "But that will have to wait for some other time. For now, I'd like you to meet my best friend," Aksana said as she turned her fist so you could see.

Before you stood a tall german shepherd lady who seemed to look at you with the same cruelty that Aksana did. Niether of them were wearing clothes. "Josh, this is Shila. You will address her as Mistress or Goddess like you will do with me."
"Pleased to see your kind has returned to our dimension, albeit a bit weaker than last time," the German Shepherd remarked, with a chuckle.
"Actually Shila, this human isn't a wizard at all. He's powerless against all of us. He's completely weak."
"Well I guess that would make what we're about to do all the more fun then," Shila said looking at you with an evil grin.

You gulp and ask "W-what are you going to do?"

"She and I are just going to torture you for a bit," Asksana explains. "Is that okay?"
"No!"

They both laugh out loud and the wolf retorts, "No? Perfect! We'll get started then." Apparently they like it more when you resist, but there is nothing that you can really do. You are Aksana's lifelong slave and you can't do anything about it.

It looks like it's going to be:
12113212121222112122.title: She will "share" you with her friends.

choices: Lounge around in the sun, letting you soak up the heat
Torture you with pleasure, forced toejob
121132121212221121221.content:
Aksana the wolf reaches down and brings up some sturdy looking string. "Shila, would you mind helping me tie him to my paw?"
"It would be my pleasure," the dog replies, as you are helplessly passed from one furry hand to the others.

"No please! Anything but there again!" You lament, "If only this were just a dream!"
"I'm afraid not," Aksana says, leaning back on her bed, relaxing as she presents her paw to Shila to tie you to. Her toes wiggling expectantly. "And since you will live forever in this world, this is a nightmare you will never wake up from."

"Actually Aksana, if he stays long enough and consumes enough matter from this world, he may end up becoming a part of our dimension after all, and therefore he can infact, die." Shila explains, while tying the rope-like string to your wrists and ankles, unimpeded by your futile struggling. Apparently Shila was an expert on your kind, but how? Aksana whimpers in grief when she hears this. "Aw, I was hoping I could torture him forever. I was going to do so many things with him every day, and then give him to my kids when I get old. He was going to make such a nice family heirloom."

As Shila binds you to your Goddesses right paw, she comforts Aksana "Oh don't worry girl! I have brought a potion that can make small creatures immortal and invincible forever. I came prepared today when you told me about him, and I knew that he would need it. So before the day is over, he will be saying goodbye to any hope of escape from this life that he might have, hehe."
"Oh thank you!" Aksana praises her friend gleefuly.

"You can't be serious?!" You retort, suddenly what was already like hell to you has just gotten worse.
"Who are you?! How do you know so much about this and why do you make potions? Are you a wizard?" You ask, having been nearly fastened in place.
"I'm a witch actually, but you can call me Goddess. That is after all what your mistress ordered you to do," The sheperd replies hautily, "And I do know just how to send you back to your home. But I won't. Once I apply this potion to you," at this she pulled up a small bottle, "you will no longer be able to be sent back. The request system won't work on you, and your new life will officially begin."

"Shila, you are the bestest friend I could ask for," Aksana remarks, a big grin on her face.
"Anything for you girl"
"Is he about done?"
"Just about.... okay now!"

The german shepherd steps back and Aksana takes a look at her handiwork. You are currently bound tightly over her pawpad, facing outward. Your limbs are spread wide apart, covering as much of the gigantic pad as your tiny body can. A rope is also around your neck, pulling you up slightly so that your head remains aligned with the space under her toes, and your waste is secured several times by another rope going across her pad horizontally. You are completely unable to move a single muscle. "Please, don't do this! I'm sorry didn't clean your paws right, or your boots completely. Please give me another chance." You beg futilely, as you watch the shephard remove the cork from the bottle.

"But Josh, don't you understand? You had your chance and you lost it. Why should I give you another one? If you want me to be honest, I shouldn't have even bothered in the first place. It was probably too generous of me to give you any chances. It would have saved me the trouble if I had just made you my slave from the beginning." The wolf says matter-of-factly, as if this was all natural to her.

"I just want to go home." You sob.

The shepherd leans in and gives you a kiss on the belly. "This is your home now, Josh. And there is no going back." She spreads her tongue over your wet face. "Hmm, your tears taste delicious. Keep crying for us, okay?" At this she dips a brush into the bottle, and brings it back out, wet and slimy. "As soon as this brush makes contact with your body, you will be unable to die by any means. You can still starve, suffocate, drown, and feel pain, but it won't kill you. You're body will not be able to be broken or torn, and most of all, you will not age. Most people would be grateful for this ability, but it only works for small creatures. So you should consider yourself lucky."
"But then again," Aksana interupts, "I suppose this won't be anything like a luxury to him."
"Correct," Shila continues, "This might as well be hell for you. There will be nothing we can do that will accidentally kill you. And the teleportation from this world to yours and back, won't work on you ever again. Everyone you know back home, are nothing but memories to you now. You are trapped here now, and here you will forever remain."

All you can do is sob and beg "No! no! no! Please no!" before you feel the cold touch of the potion being spread on your body, which seeps through your skin. You writhe in agony as it causes you to feel unimaginable pain, but only for a brief time, before it dies down. You are doomed now, and any hope you had of going back home is now gone, as well as possibly escaping these monstrous canines.

Aksana smiles and wiggles her toes happily. "See? That wasn't so bad was it?"
You do nothing but cry silently, but you soon run out of tears.

"I guess we should get started then," and Aksana decides:
